<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Living Thunderclap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=647)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A living thunderclap is a humanoid-shaped storm cloud that cracks and booms with thunder.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalAir_LivingThunderclap.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Living Thunderclap](/Monsters.aspx?ID=647)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 106 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -3

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 50

**Immunities**
bleed, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145), sonic

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 50 feet; swiftness

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
gust +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning plus [Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=25) 5 feet

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
lightning bolt +14 ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 2d12 electricity

**Swiftness**   The living thunderclap doesn't trigger reactions when it moves.

**Thunderbolt** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The living thunderclap emits a bolt of lightning that crashes with deafening thunder. The living thunderclap makes a lightning bolt Strike that deals 1d12 electricity damage. If it hits, the target and any creatures within a 15-foot emanation around the target take 2d6 sonic damage and must attempt a DC 18 basic Fortitude save. Any creature that fails its save is also [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-41" />
name: Living Thunderclap
